Very Disappointing Feels Like a Mockery of Listeners I used to enjoy Kuku FM for its wide variety of audio stories, but now it feels like a trap. Most stories end abruptly with a to be continued message, promising a second part that never comes even after months of waiting! This isnt just lazy, its disrespectful to the audience. Its as if theyre mocking us, keeping us hooked just to boost their engagement. If you cant complete a story, dont publish it in the first place.

Firstly, the selection of books was extremely limited, which was unexpected. Additionally, the narration was done at an unusually fast pace, with no pauses for punctuation, full stops, or exclamation marks, making it difficult to follow the story. To Kuku FM team - Pls check the Audible app and see the difference.

Kuku FM Review Kuku FM is a fantastic platform for anyone who loves learning, storytelling, and entertainment on the go. It offers a wide variety of audiobooks, podcasts, and courses in multiple languages, making it accessible to a diverse audience. The app's user-friendly interface, offline listening feature, and affordable subscription plans add to its appeal. Whether youre looking for personal growth content, fiction, or motivation, Kuku FM has something for everyone.

The vast library of titles and genres has something for everyone, and the user-friendly interface makes it easy to discover new favorites.
